name: Event Management App
description: Event creation, ticketing, and attendee management platform

issues.title: Build event creation and management
issues.body:
## Description
Create and manage events.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Event details form
- [ ] Date and location
- [ ] Event images
- [ ] Description
- [ ] Edit/cancel events

issues.title: Implement event discovery and search
issues.body:
## Description
Browse and search events.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Event listings
- [ ] Search by location
- [ ] Category filters
- [ ] Date filters
- [ ] Map view

issues.title: Create RSVP and registration system
issues.body:
## Description
Event registration.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] RSVP to events
- [ ] Guest registration
- [ ] Waitlist management
- [ ] Confirmation emails
- [ ] Check-in system

issues.title: Build attendee management
issues.body:
## Description
Manage event attendees.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Attendee list
- [ ] Export data
- [ ] Send updates
- [ ] Check-in tracking
- [ ] Attendee messaging

issues.title: Implement ticketing system
issues.body:
## Description
Paid ticket sales.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Ticket types
- [ ] Pricing tiers
- [ ] Early bird pricing
- [ ] Promo codes
- [ ] Capacity limits

issues.title: Add payment processing
issues.body:
## Description
Secure payment handling.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Credit card payments
- [ ] Payment gateway
- [ ] Refund processing
- [ ] Transaction history
- [ ] Payout to organizers

issues.title: Create QR code tickets and check-in
issues.body:
## Description
Digital tickets and scanning.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Generate QR tickets
- [ ] Mobile tickets
- [ ] Scan to check-in
- [ ] Duplicate prevention
- [ ] Offline mode
